_translator_note: This is the multilingual template file for the software. Users can copy this file, rename it to other languages (such as en_US.json), and translate all text values. The software will automatically detect all JSON files in this folder, and users can select the language to use in the software.

ui.sample_count: Sample Points (2~100: measurement points excluding 1st fixed point):
ui.deadzone_back_step: Retreat Step (when moving too fast, can go to 0):
ui.keepalive: Keep Gamepad Input Active (prevent switching to mouse/keyboard)
ui.keepalive_enable: Enable (periodically tap a button during deadzone detection & timing wait)
ui.hold: Hold Button During Test (disabled by default)
ui.hold_enable: Enable (continuously hold specified button/trigger during test)
ui.generate_charts_prompt_body: CSV saved. Click [Generate Charts] to render images now (or use [Generate from CSV] later).
ui.info_description:
Purpose: Measure the "input optimization curve made by the game on the controller" (not hardware deadzone).

Operation Process:
  1) Click [Enable Emulation], then switch back to game.
  2) Complete the test on [Mouse Drag Virtual Sticks] (requires multiple complete rotations).
  3) Click [Start Test], the app will automatically sample, time, and output results.
  4) [Save CSV] to export, can be viewed in Excel or processed further.

Hotkeys: F6=Start, F7=Record Point, F8=Deadzone Test, F9=Retreat, F10=End Deadzone, F11=Retry.

Common Issues: Stick coordinates "jitter""not smooth" → Check if the game itself has hardware deadzone / assist.
ui.hotkey_hint_symbol:
Detected number/symbol key binding.
✅ Auto-switched to keyboard_scan mode (better for fullscreen/symbol keys).
 Tip: Change symbol keys to F-keys/letters to auto-switch back to keyboard_name.
ui.hotkey_hint_normal:
No number/symbol keys detected.
✅ Using keyboard_name mode (more intuitive, F-keys/letters recommended).
 If you bind symbol keys, will auto-switch to keyboard_scan.
ui.hotkey_hint_failed:
⚠️ keyboard_name mode registration failed, auto-switched to keyboard_scan.
 Possible causes: fullscreen game / insufficient permissions / antivirus / unrecognized key names.
 Suggestion: bind F-keys/letters; if needed, run as admin or disable antivirus hooks.

status.emulation_already_enabled: Emulation already enabled: no device restart.
status.emulation_enabled_success: ✅ Emulation enabled. Switch back to game before starting test.

charts.inverse_title: Inverse Curve (Percentage Swap: One-to-One Correspondence with Forward Points)

messages.emulation_already_on: Emulation already enabled: no device restart.
messages.emulation_enabled: ✅ Emulation enabled. Switch back to game before starting test.
messages.hotkey_mode_forbidden: ⚠️ Test in progress, cannot switch hotkey mode (stop/reset first).
messages.hotkey_registration_failed: ⚠️ keyboard_name mode registration failed, auto-switched to keyboard_scan (see logs).
messages.hotkey_capture_waiting: Press the key you want to bind… (no popup interrupt)
messages.hotkey_capture_scan: Waiting for key: scan code mode capture… (press key directly)
messages.hotkey_capture_name: Waiting for key: key name mode capture… (press key in window)
messages.hotkey_capture_forbidden: ⚠️ Test in progress, cannot modify hotkey (stop/reset first).
messages.test_stopped: Stopped and reset (virtual gamepad will not disconnect/restart).
messages.test_started:
✅ Test started: entering [Deadzone Detection].
Current magnitude: m={magnitude:.4f}
No movement: press [Deadzone Key] to increase.
Moving too fast: press [Retreat Key] to retreat (can go to 0).
Starting slow movement: press [End Deadzone Key] to confirm and enter curve sampling.
messages.deadzone_increased:
[Deadzone Detection] still no movement: m → {magnitude:.4f}
Start slow movement: press [End Deadzone Key].
messages.deadzone_adjust:
[Point 1 Fine-tune] increased deadzone value: m → {magnitude:.4f}
After confirm, press [Record Key] to start timing.
messages.deadzone_decreased:
[Deadzone Detection] retreated: m → {magnitude:.4f}
Start slow movement: press [End Deadzone Key].
messages.deadzone_adjust_back:
[Point 1 Fine-tune] retreated deadzone value: m → {magnitude:.4f}
After confirm, press [Record Key] to start timing.
messages.retry_no_test: ⚠️ No test started yet, cannot retry.
messages.ready_to_generate_charts: ✅ CSV saved. Ready to generate charts.
messages.param_error: Fix as prompted: sample points 2~10; and 0<=MIN<MAX<=1.
messages.retry_reset_message: Retry Test - Reset current point (m={magnitude:.4f})\nRetries needed: {repeat_count}\nPress [Record Key] to start retesting.

hints.log_write_failed_cause: Likely system permissions / antivirus blocking / path not writable (environment issue)
hints.log_write_failed_action: Suggest placing the program in a normal folder on non-system drive, running as admin, or disabling antivirus blocking.
hints.log_header_msg1: This log is for general users: if you have problems, first check lines containing [CAUSE]/[ACTION].
hints.log_header_msg2: Key keywords: HOTKEY / enable_emulation / start_test / record / finish_and_save.
hints.hotkey_during_test_cause: Changing hotkey during test causes trigger anomalies / loss (user operation issue)
hints.hotkey_bind_fail_title: Attempted to change hotkey during test
hints.hotkey_capture_fail_cause: Possibly special key / system blocking / permission issue (environment issue)
hints.hotkey_capture_fail_action: Try binding other keys, or run as admin.
hints.enable_gamepad_fail_cause: Possibly ViGEm driver / permissions / antivirus blocking / system environment issue (environment issue)
hints.enable_gamepad_fail_action: Suggest: verify ViGEmBus installation; run as admin; disable blocking; restart and try again.
hints.no_emulation_start_title: Starting test without enabling gamepad emulation
hints.no_emulation_start_cause: Incorrect user operation sequence (user operation issue)
hints.no_emulation_start_action: Enable emulation first, then start test.
hints.param_error_action: Fix as prompted: sample points 2~10; and 0<=MIN<MAX<=1.
hints.hold_key_fail_cause: Virtual gamepad status anomaly or driver issue (environment issue)
hints.hold_key_fail_action: Try re-enabling/disabling emulation, or check driver.
hints.no_valid_records_cause: No data recorded during test (user operation issue)
hints.no_valid_records_action: Start test again and press [Record Key] to save data.
hints.no_timing_records_cause: No valid timing information in records (user operation or software issue)
hints.no_timing_records_action: Check record data or perform test again.
hints.no_analysis_cause: Data analysis failed (possibly parameter issue or software bug)
hints.no_analysis_action: Check if test data is complete, or check logs for more info.
hints.export_fail_cause: Exception occurred during export (possibly permission or environment issue)
hints.export_fail_action: Check program directory permissions, or check logs for more info.
hints.exit_confirm_msg: Test in progress, are you sure you want to exit? (will abort current test)
hints.keepalive_tap_fail_cause: Virtual gamepad may be unavailable/driver error (likely environment issue)
hints.keepalive_tap_fail_action: Try stopping the test and restarting the virtual gamepad; or restart your computer.
hints.hold_key_apply_fail_cause: Virtual gamepad/driver state is abnormal or interface not supported (likely environment issue)
hints.hold_key_apply_fail_action: First disable hold key feature; then enable after confirming virtual gamepad is available.
hints.timing_result_empty_cause: Record process may not be completed (user operation issue)
hints.timing_result_empty_action: Ensure each record: press start once, then press end once.
hints.timing_result_empty_dialog: No valid timing records (seconds is empty)
hints.output_phase_error_cause: Likely a code/environment error (need to check traceback); hard for user to resolve via operation
hints.output_phase_error_action: Send the log to the author (especially the traceback section).
hints.output_phase_error_dialog: An error occurred during the output phase.
hints.stats_result_empty_cause: Insufficient data or abnormal record process (more likely user operation/interruption)
hints.stats_result_empty_action: Re-test, ensure each point has more than 0 records.
hints.export_complete_status:
✅ Complete: Output finished
  - Curve.png / Curve with coords.png
  - Inverse curve.png / Inverse curve with coords.png
  - results.csv / curve_summary.csv / compensation_table.csv
  - Log: {log_path}

Note: Inverse curve point count matches forward curve point count exactly, mapped one-to-one via 'percentage swap'.
hints.language_switched_status: ✅ Language switched to: {lang_code} (charts will use new language)

errors.sample_count_invalid_type: Sample count must be an integer (2~100).
errors.magnitude_range_invalid: Magnitude range must satisfy: 0 <= MIN < MAX <= 1.
errors.csv_format_not_supported: CSV format not supported (need results.csv or curve_summary.csv structure).
